website_summaries.verdict: These pods are an impressive choice for anyone who finds it important to use products free of toxins and made with natural ingredients.
pros: Made with a non-toxic formula and naturally-derived ingredients, providing a natural alternative to laundry
Since these contain no harsh ingredients, they’re good for sensitive skin
cons: This is a pricier option due to natural ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Wet dirty dog and vomit!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were happy to find a green solution to our laundry needs. We were excited enough to tell our kids and they bought it too. After a few weeks they started talking about how bad their clothes smelled after washing them, we noticed it also and the common denominator was this laundry detergent. We all tried different detergents and all our laundry smells good again. The smell was somewhere between wet dirty dog and vomit so unless you are into that smell I would stay away from this one. Sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best smell ever, but there's a drawback...
customer_reviews.text: I first got this stuff as a sample for moving into my latest apartment complex, and I loved the smell so much that I went looking for it. YOU CAN'T FIND THIS IN THE STORES! Believe me when I say, I've looked ever every store near me and NO ONE had it. Luckily Amazon has it. CAUTION: Use ONE pod, and always use MORE water than the clothing level you select. Ie) if you're running a medium load, select large on the washer. Sometimes the powder doesn't wash completely out when equal parts laundry to equal parts water.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Decent but likely won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t a strong scent, which I prefer. The downfall is that the product doesn’t dissolve in warm or cold water. It has to be fairly warm, and the coating never dissipates. I find myself breaking it open and scattering it at the bottom before putting laundry in. If you sprinkle over the laundry it’ll leave marks. I toss the package the detergent comes in. If you use cold water there will be marks left all over your laundry. I did have a great reaction as I haven’t broken out in a rash or hives. My clothes do feel clean and it’s great for underwear. I wouldn’t recommend or buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Dissolve
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I used Vetiver pods from another manufacturer, but could no longer find them so I thought I would try these instead. The scent is wonderful, and I like more bio-friendly products, so this seemed to be a natural choice. My biggest issue with this product, however, is that the pods either do not completely dissolve or they dissolve but lodge on the clothing, especially in cold water. I will take clothing out of the dryer only to find that a chunk of detergent stuck to the clothes during the wash cycle and now is hardened like plaster. I don't think I would recommend these or buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: RGSR

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective cleaning, ineffective odor removal, takes 2-3 pods per large load
customer_reviews.text: I am having to re-wash gym clothes, socks and bedding because even after washing and drying, they smell like they've never been washed. Also, FYI, a standard large load takes 2 pods. Even with 3 pods, though, it wasn't effective at removing normal soil/stains. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: The Science Chick

customer_reviews.title: Scent changed?!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I reached out to Grab Green and they sent me a brand new bag! I think the batches got switched up in packaging and I was scent Lavender/Vanilla the first time. Happy to have the beautiful Vetiver scent back! Our family has gone through so many detergents, I’ve lost count. We finally found the Vetiver scent and fell in love, until recently. I ordered about a week ago and the Vetiver pods we received had a floral/vanilla scent, which is no where near the usual crisp earthy scent we’re used to. Either we got a bad batch or they’ve changed the scent. Extremely disappointed and probably won’t be purchasing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Olson

customer_reviews.title: Makes clothes smell like baby vomit
customer_reviews.text: This detergent smells great at first but a few days after washing, the clothes start to smell like baby spit up. It's a weird sweet milky smell. Both of my kids have commented about separately. Now I see that other reviewers had the same experience. Seems to wash things fairly well but the pods don't completely disintegrate, so I find large chunks in the washing machine. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Gentle smell & excellent cleaning abilities
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought these laundry pods since they’re easier to carry to the laundromat than huge gallons of fabric softener & detergent but I love the smell and they clean wonderfully! They leave a VERY gentle smell on your clothes. I’ve never been sensitive to strong scented laundry until my mom gifted me some sheets that she’d washed with her regular softener & detergent and it was too strong for me since I’m used to these little pods! They always remove grime and they’re so easy to just pop into the washing machines. No more oil spots from fabric softener!
customer_reviews.author: Lovemyipad2

customer_reviews.title: Pods don't dissolve
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if I'm using it wrong or not (even though I followed instructions on the bag), but this product doesn't work. I did two separate washes with two pods each (big loads), and the pods didn't dissolve in either. I had to wipe the powder off all of my clothes. I have no idea if my clothes got cleaned with detergent or just rinsed with water. The pods were completely solid after I took them out of the wash. Hopefully I can return because otherwise the product is useless if it doesn't dissolve in the washer..
customer_reviews.author: Anna Y.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t dissolve entirely if you add the pod at the end.
customer_reviews.text: Some buyers have complained that the pod doesn’t completely dissolve upon the end of the washing cycle. We also had this problem, but I found that if you throw in the pod first before adding your clothes, it will dissolve much better. Just wait a few minutes before adding in your clothes—I sorta like to watch it disintegrate before adding my clothes in to make sure that there won’t be any surprise residue left at the end of the washing cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, natural laundry detergent that works!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to move over to using natural products. These work well and smell awesome! A lot of times all natural cleaning products do not actually get my clothing clean (assuming because no artificial, harsh ingredients are in them), but this detergent does! I have not had a problem with any of my clothes being dirty post washing. The product also dissolves easily (I have had problems before where there are clumps of powder post washing). Furthermore, the scent is pleasant, but a little strong. However, it is only strong when it is in the bag and does NOT leave your clothes smelling too strong. Overall, I would recommend as an affordable, natural laundry detergent that works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin types!
customer_reviews.text: I have always missed out on getting laundry detergent that smells nice due to my sensitive skin. Introducing Grab Green Natural Pods...the only one I've found in pod form that doesn't break me out or make me itch everywhere! The smell is pleasant and it's obviously easy to use...you just pop on in the washer before you load the clothes and behold....clean clothes after the cycle finishes! I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to use scented detergent, but hasn't found one that works for them!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: The scent that made me like this product is gone!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this detergent for about 5 years when I found it by chance on a business trip. The scent was so distinctive I liked it instantly and received several compliments on my clothes smelling very good but unusual. However, That has changed in the last couple of years or so. The scent is not as potent as it once was and is also a bit different. I think less essential oils are used as a cost-cutting measure, blah. I just received my latest order and can’t smell the Vetiver at all ven when I stick my nose in the pod package! Very disappointed. It’s like my whole experience w/ original, original Gain from 20 years ago all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Cbrashear

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mix well with water
customer_reviews.text: It might smell better than regular unscented detergent, you just don’t smell it that much through the plastic bag. Clothing doesn’t smell lavender after washing. Not good review because plastic bags don’t disappear in water, I was finding plastic in clothes many times even after washing in warm/hot water (plastic was found in folds of clothes). I started to open the plastic bag all the time after but the detergent itself sometimes was still visible after washing, mostly was stuck in fluffy materials (like coat hoods, small fluffy rugs), meaning that ingredients are not mixing with water very well. Also, plastic is not good for you, particles may stay in clothes. Will switch to non-plastic bag solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kariina

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed!  My clothes came out smelling dirty still !!
customer_reviews.text: I was so bummed that these didn't work for me. I have a brand new washing machine so I know that's not the problem, but my clothes come out smelling like dirty laundry still when I use these - I even put an extra pod in every time! I will say that I do use the Grab Green dishwashing pods and I LOVE those!! But for my clothes, I'm going to have to find another eco-friendly detergent.
customer_reviews.author: CreatoritaDelBosce

customer_reviews.title: The freshest smelling laundry detergent I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to go back to cheaper brands, but they just don't do as good a job getting the stink out of technical fabrics.These work much better, and leave a very pleasant, clean scent on our clothes. It's especially nice on sheets and blankets, which seem to stay fresh longer. We have a well with water high in iron and manganese. We use a filter to get rid of these, but no softener, and we've never had a problem with the pods not dissolving. We also used these in a house with a public water supply and found they worked well there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact these are a natural, or more natural, product as I have eczema and allergies I have a front load washer and have been using the tap water temperature feature. Granted it's summer and the tap water is pretty warm and the pods have dissolved completely. I have a soft water filtration system too, so only use one pod. It will be interesting to see if these dissolve in cold water in the winter. Clothes smell fresh and are soft without using fabric softener.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Gets stains out without nasty chemicals + light scent!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pods, they're convenient, eco-friendly and they do the job without an overwhelming artificial smell. I still spot treat but overall everything I've washed with these have come out bright and clean. I have had it happen only once or twice that they didn't get fully used in a wash, make sure you put them in first at the bottom of the washing machine as instructed so that doesn't happen to you.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: these laundry pods
customer_reviews.text: are so exceptional in quality and performance, it's hard to find the words. There is no added smell only a heavenly clean scent when you take them out of the dryer, Left a pair of white cotton undies in a mixed dark/bedding wash it was pure white! upset with the price increase after my first purchase but see it was recently adjusted. I hope the formula will remain as is and I will look forward to buying this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Daleen Rose

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get my clothes clean:(
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love these because I hate using all of the chemicals in standard brands...but I guess you need chemicals to actually get clothes clean:( The scent was nice when I first opened the bag, but it has since dissipated and certainly doesn’t leave clothes smelling like anything.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: No allergic reaction which is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have ben using this product for years now. I switched from Tide and baby detergent, Draft due to allergic reaction on my daughter. I learned that the Draft and Tide contains so much harmful chemicals in it and there were no doubt that it cause me and my daughter’s skin allergenic and sensitive. Since we switched to this product, nobody in my family had any skin issue. I love the scent and it powerfully cleans dirty clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Jinny Pearson

customer_reviews.title: The Fresh Scent of Summer
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I love this stuff since it's smell is like receiving flowers BUT I would recommend using dryer sheets because it may smell musty but that may because of our water here, but remember this stuff is natural, sometimes it needs a booster and I will take natural over chemical filled stuff. Plus dryer sheets do help soften and fluff the towels and clothes. FYI, don't double up the soap pods because the smell can be overpowering. It's honestly the only clothing soap I use but it's not sold here in Hawaii so thanks Amazon. It's a better value for our family to get this larger bag than a small bag since we do laundry 3-4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J.

customer_reviews.title: Heavily fragranced. Not natural. SEVERE ALLERGIC REACTION.
customer_reviews.text: Grab green prides themselves on using natural ingredients - thinking even their fragranced items would be natural; upon reviewing ingredients one the pods arrived it says fragrance derived from essential oils and get this ‘safe man made ingredients’ what they FAIL to do is disclose those safe ingredients. They are deceitful and fail to be truly transparent. Causing SEVERE allergic reactions - I would NEVER recommend this product to anyone looking for a safe, natural alternative. Keep looking!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Scent survives the dryer! YAY!
customer_reviews.text: This was a find through Environmental Working Group's database and I couldn't have been more excited to find one of my favorite scents available as laundry detergent and in PODS! I love love love laundry pods. Now, if only they make dryer sheets that are also safe for the environment with scents that survive the dryer, I'd just die and go to heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Rockets Red Glare

customer_reviews.title: Awesome For Highly Sensitive People
customer_reviews.text: This soap is fantastic! I have severe chemical sensitivity, especially to fragrance. The unscented is TRULY unscented. So many claim to be but still have lingering chemical smells. I was hesitant to try yet another pod soap, but I’m so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: When I switched to this brand my clothes began smelling rancid. I switched back to tide unscented clean and everything went back to normal so it has to be this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite laundry detergent!!! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a non toxic laundry detergent pod for a long time. After doing some research I decided to go with the lavender vanilla scent, Rated B on EWG's website. Although the fragrance free was rated higher (A), I LOVE the smell of the clothes. They are super easy to use in my front loader. I am pregnant and have a baby on the way and my nesting has kicked in to wear I am washing all the clothes and organizing them getting ready. I feel this will be safe to use on my child rather than use Tide.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Poe

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean well as the other scents
customer_reviews.text: I love Grab Green baby detergents - but these are not great. Smell is not great, it does not clean as well, and you need 3 pods or so for a medium load and to get a decent wash. I liked the smell at first, but the aftersmell is not great, not sure how to explain it in words. The lavender scent is the best! Not going for these again.
customer_reviews.author: Khanu’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: This does actually work well
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans clothes very well and they smell fresh. The dishwasher cleaning products from this company are some of the best cleaning products that I have every used.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and company!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with all grab green products! This scent is amazing and has made a huge difference w my autoimmune skin issues! This product (pods) is great and also love the 3 in 1 powder. I actually use the powder to scrub my soap stone sink, get baked on grease off bottom of nonstick pots and pans, and even use on patio and patio furniture! I so glad I came upon this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Says unscented...but towels don't smell fresh with this
customer_reviews.text: They clean okay, but when I use with my towels, the towels have an odd unfresh scent after, pods have the same weird smell. I live in the desert so towels are not mildrewed, etc. Just seems to be that way with towels, use on my sheets and they are fine. Won't use on clothes just in case. Must be some fabrics that take the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Citprof

customer_reviews.title: I had found that after using these pods that my clothes smelled wonderful and my clothes were softer too
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a pod that works well and isn't harmful, but these pods work well! I had found that after using these pods that my clothes smelled wonderful and my clothes were softer too. I do encourage you buy these since they are cheaper than the store brand organic pods and they aren't harmful to you or the environment. The fragrance I bough was vanilla :)
customer_reviews.author: Kendra H

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Scent & Tough on Stain
customer_reviews.text: We love this : wonderful scent and tough on stain. We let our 18-month old girl eat by herself. She loves berries/fruits and spaghetti. I used to spray stain remover on her messy clothes before throwing in the washer. But that hasn’t happened lately. I just set the washer to soak and wash twice. Put this on. All done!
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bunny Mama

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of these in a noobie box and liked them so I bought these. If you don't use 2 or 3 and fabric softener it makes the clothes smell funky. Like a soured lavender smell. No matter if I immediately put the clothes in the dryer or waited a few hours, I always ended up with a soured smell in our laundry. I still have half a bag and probably won't use the rest. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch or bad scent....made my clothes smell moldy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I got a bad batch of this detergent but it made all of my clothes stink. They smelled moldy and musty and disgusting! I had to rewatch many loads of laundry in different detergent because I couldn’t stand my clothes smelling musty and like they hadn’t been washed in months. While this scent/batch of detergent didn’t work for me, I LOVE the grab green laundry detergent powder in water lily scent.
customer_reviews.author: greencap27

customer_reviews.title: A new design or ?
customer_reviews.text: I always buy GG laundry detergent. It was the first time when I saw a different package. Did they change design for GG products? If they have different designs (I didn’t see that one before) they should have it in description or Amazon pictures. I’m still not sure it’s a real GG or maybe fake.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Pho

customer_reviews.title: love this company's products
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these detergents a long time now, ever since i got a rash from other detergents. Doesn't happen with these - i use the free and clear for the pet laundry and everybody seems happy!!
customer_reviews.author: keebieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Itchy and not eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: Used two of these and they make me itch. Definitely not for sensitive skin. Sadly this same Brands other products in the different type of package don't give me any issues. I was hoping the three in one would be better stain remover but it's not even that. Not eligible for return, frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I found a bag near the register while waiting in line at TJMaxx. I remembered I was getting low on laundry detergent so I decided, why not for $5 a bag for naturally derrived laundry pods I'll give it a try. I have to say I'm very impressed! I wasn't expecting much but they really do get my laundry clean and smell wonderful and fresh! I finished my bag and have been purchasing larger bags on Amazon ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural and eco friendly laundry pod so gave this one a try. I bought the lavender vanilla scent, but it does not smell good at all. Left my laundry smelling like barf and had to rewash everything. Maybe the other scents might have smelled better, but the pod did not completely dissolve in the wash and I was left with a big clump of detergent still in the bottom of the washer. So not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kathy wong

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: We make our own laundry detergent recipe, but decided the convenience of this style would be appreciated for our road trip. It does everything we expected: clean clothes, no residue.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeImpressed

customer_reviews.title: does not dissolve in laundry.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was fine, but the product is TERRIBLE. Half of the pod is left at the end of the cycle. This has happened multiple times so I'm going to have to just throw the whole bag away. What a waste and It's too late for me to return it as I still had a lot of my old detergent left and was waiting til it was finished.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Melted plastic
customer_reviews.text: If you like melted plastic in your clothes - get these !! 😭 The pods don’t dissolve properly in the wash - you throw your clothes in the dryer without seeing the pod and there you have it ..... melted plastic on your freshly laundered items.
customer_reviews.author: LauraSealey

customer_reviews.title: So good!!
customer_reviews.text: I only use natural products and this is a great one. The pods always dissolve nicely in the wash, they dont turn into weird clumps and stick to one pair of pants like tide pods do. The smell is beautiful!!!! It’s delicate but it lasts, I love getting into bed and smelling natural vanilla and lavender on my bedding. It’s refreshing to not smell nauseating artificial chemical fragranced laundry detergent on my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that cleans my gym clothes
customer_reviews.text: I should be embarrassed, but Im not because, well I dont stink. I've tried everything. The enzymes in this actually work. Everything comes out clean, no powder residue and it smells fantastic. Plus Im super sensitive to detergents becasue I can either break out in hives or get eczema. This has been the absolute best.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Steward

customer_reviews.title: Smell start bothering me !
customer_reviews.text: I been using this product over couple years! First it was fine! Lately I just don’t like the smell ! Not sure it is changing or me changing hahaha! To be honest smelling like a puke lately! Probably have to stop my subscription!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: May Need To Wash In HOT Water
customer_reviews.text: Don't cate for the smell, very strong soap scent. Makes me sneeze. Washing with cold water, the tablet didn't fully disolve.as show in pic. Hot water may give better results.
customer_reviews.author: ivy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, cleans great
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite detergent for years. The smell is so clean and soft (lavender vanilla), and it seems to deep clean our clothes well. We tend toward natural products in our home, and it checks all of the boxes aside from the fragrance box. I’ll stick with my sensitive nose on this and say that whatever fragrance concoction they’re using is great. Can’t speak for the other scent though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: geat
customer_reviews.text: This was my very first time using this product and will buy it again. Really appreciate the environmentally awareness of this company. I hope that they could find some new packaging material as plastic is not an environmentally friendly source.
customer_reviews.author: Ivona Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money 😡
customer_reviews.text: I shop on amazon atleast 3 times a week and I never leave reviews but in this case I had to!!! These laundry pods were absolutely horrible!!! They literally don’t dissolve at all! No matter how much I tried I kept ending up with massive chunks of soap! So unhappy! Don’t waste your money folks!
customer_reviews.author: Slickems

customer_reviews.title: Nice laundry pods
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as any other detergent. It’s a good compromise for my house. Husband likes Tide Pods and I like less fragrance and more eco-friendly. The fragrance is nice and sticks with your laundry (ours sometimes smells-we have an older washer & dryer) not 100% naturally derived though. I will probably stick with this brand for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Caeles

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: I've used pretty much every "hippie", as my husband calls it, detergent. I kind of gave up, Not loving any of them for varied reasons Went back to Tide no scent. Read about this product in "Clean Eating" magazine and saw it was on subscribe/save. LOVE IT!!!! Great smell. Clean clothes. Pods dissolve fully. Really like both lavender and gardenia. Now a monthly s/s for this house!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Not just a good environmental choice- it's a better product!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this detergent. After years of tide pods I made the choice and we purchased these. Great cleaning power, smells great and leaves clothes in great shape. Do recommend using one higher water setting. I feel like the extra water is worth the environment gains.
customer_reviews.author: IssaquahCritic

customer_reviews.title: Wish these performed better.
customer_reviews.text: These never fully break down in my front loading machine. I was leaving them in the dispenser and letting them be used for 2 washes. I do enjoy the smell but I think these made the build up in my washer worse. These were the only change and suddenly the gunk is backing up into the tub of my fairly new washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lllljjjjssss

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling detergent!
customer_reviews.text: We love these. They clean well and smell amazing! Just be sure to put it at the bottom of the tub otherwise it might not fully dissolve. It says to do it on the package but I ignored it a few times and found a half dissolved piece when the washer was done.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Jeffords

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best things I have EVER smelled!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could marry this scent (haha). It is by far the best natural detergent for the price and I love that the small bag is so affordable to try before committing. We have 4 littles and this gets all the laundry super fresh and clean and works great in our front load machine. One of our kids has extremely sensitive skin so I'm always hesitant to try anything with fragrance but her skin has been great!
customer_reviews.author: ashelyn downs

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I was so excited for these but they made my clothes smell SOUR 😭 I wanted to blame anything else but reading some reviews made it clear it's the detergent. Also didn't desolve all the way no matter what temp water I used.
customer_reviews.author: Bailie

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, dissolves well even in cold water
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched back to Grab Green after trying a few different brands and types of detergent. This is my hands down favorite. The scent, lavender vanilla, is neither too floral nor too sporty, making it a nice balanced scent for any family member. Unlike pods from a few other brands I've tried, these consistently dissolve in even cold washes, meaning that I don't find little clumps of undissolved detergent in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Smells so pretty! Scent is very nice for both male and female. My son has sensitive skin and this does not make him itchy. I use 2 in my larger capacity washer
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Enhanced formula has a new smell
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars and the only reason is that the scent changed. The new and enhanced formula has a different smell and it does not permeate like the old version. My sheets do not smell as nice as with the old pods. Otherwise, this is an amazing detergent and works well. It is also an amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like it anywhere else. This is my favorite laundry detergent. One pod takes care of a large load of normally soiled or worn items. Two pods for heavy soil. The vetiver scent is refreshing and uplifting, and folded things retain that natural sweet smell for quite a long time. I recently unpacked a blanket that was stored away last spring (over six months ago), and was transported. Some compare the scent of vetiver with patchouli, but I find this to be a lighter natural scent.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Brogan

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it doesn't fully dissolve
customer_reviews.text: I do like the smell and the idea, but I am very concerned that I find about 40%-50% of the pod left as a chunk in the bottom of the washer each time. I normally wash in cold water, but this has happened in warm water as well. I'm just not sure it's enough detergent to clean my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Pellets do not dissolve, clothes are not cleaned
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this more than I do. The scent is good, but these pellets do *not* dissolve all the way, in warm or cold water, and so I find I sometimes have to re-wash laundry because it obviously is not fully cleaned. I often find chunks of the pellets in the washer (or tucked into a sheet, pillowcase, sock), and in the dryer even. Disappointing, because I really want a 'green' laundry option.
customer_reviews.author: xeyda

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised that the product could be chemical free because it smells like ammonia or the products used to dye hair in ...
customer_reviews.text: While this product does seem to clean my clothes, the smell is absolutely awful. I am surprised that the product could be chemical free because it smells like ammonia or the products used to dye hair in a beauty salon. There is no way this scent could even be compared to Lavender Vanilla. It smells so bad I won't even finish using it. Waste of money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great clean smell, gets clothes clean, low suds, pods made of thin substance, that dissolves and doesnt clog up washer drain, doesnt over suds, which also messes up my machine.
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! They leave plastic and powder everywhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst pods I've ever used! They don't break down unless you use HOT water, so they leave melted plastic junk in every load of laundry. Not only that, but the powder doesn't dissolve either so your clothes look like they came out of a snow globe. It also has no lasting smell and doesn't make clothes look clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a Tide pod (unscented) user but I wanted to find something natural and that would work well. The day I found these Amazon was offering $2 off. I read the reviews and decided to give it a go. I am not disappointed! The scent is fabulous and they work great! Will continue to use. I wish there was a liquid softener in the same scent!
customer_reviews.author: The Coding Anglophile

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t melt packet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t melt packet on cold wash and I only wash on cold so useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great natural laundry pod. Leaves clothes smelling great. I have used a few different brands and this is by far my favorite. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Even my husband likes the pretty sent and I don't break out
customer_reviews.text: Love the sent....I have super sensitive skin.....this does not bother my skin and I love it. My husband makes note when it is laundry day and because I don't use traditional dryer sheets and usually use "free" type detergent he makes a comment every time.... if he likes it and I done break out Win Win!
customer_reviews.author: Malen C Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Do It To Yourself
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn’t enjoy the smell of this “scent less” detergent as it smells like “outside” and I had hopes that the scent would fade but it left my clothes with a slight pine smell which I couldn’t stand. Also, it did not effectively clean my laundry as there were stains that remained on my laundry even after trying a second wash with hot water and 2 pods. Very disappointed in this product and I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It cleans well and is good for those wanting to reduce toxin body burden
customer_reviews.text: Very much enjoying this natural product. I'm reducing toxic body burden. And this product makes my clothes look, feel and smell fresh and clean. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good scent but doesn't dissolve the way it should.
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent but the pods don't fully dissolve in the washer. Have to pre-dissolve the pods in hot water. The soap itself doesn't fully dissolve in the wash either. Even on a warm wash cycle I still find chunks of soap throughout my clothes. I shake them out as I put my wash in the dryer. It's not a product I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L.

customer_reviews.title: Smells soooooo good!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these!! They smell wonderful. They smell really strong in the bag, but after then wash it is a light wonderful scent. I wish they had a matching fabric softener and dryer sheets!! I think this will be my go to laundry detergent from now on
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product because I had to use a knife to cut them open and the scent just wasn’t there after the wash
customer_reviews.author: Loree J Condra

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT dissolve! Do Not buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Just a powdery mess every where, on your clothes . Just AWFUL do not purchase! Does not smell like Lavender Vanilla either . Do not waste your money on this !
customer_reviews.author: Nonagoga 7

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The fragrance (traces
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The fragrance (traces, not overpowering)lingers even after drying. It's such a treat to have that nice smell on your towels when you come out of the shower. Very natural herbal smell. I had tried different ways to make my laundry smells nice, EO in the rinse, EO in my wool dryer balls, nothing works as good as this in keeping the fragrance last so long. I used the othe fragrance in this line, votiver works the best
customer_reviews.author: d.lee

customer_reviews.title: Hot and Cold
customer_reviews.text: I love these little pods. The scent was overwhelming coming out of the bag, and I was worried that my clothes would smell too strong of it, but they didn't. They kept a nice light scent. The only thing I found was that they don't dissolve so well in cold washes. I ended up with a good about of residue on some darker items. I got it off easily enough with a dry washcloth, but for future cold washes I opened up the pod and sprinkled the powder in instead. They dissolve perfectly well in warm and hot washes. I will keep buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stafura

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the natural easy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use as they are PODs for the washer. The sent is a little strong at first but then fades as the package is used. I enjoy the more natural aspect of the product and easy ness for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Funtime

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I break out from Tide pods and do not from this detergent. Cleans everything great and smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McNutt

customer_reviews.title: Love these pods. Will keep buying!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pods. Both this scent and unscented. They leave a light fragrance but it’s natural smelling and clean the clothes well. I usually use two in large loads.
customer_reviews.author: Feed the Wellness

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST laundry detergent. Everyone who uses it is instantly converted. I have two kids and this cleans clothes, takes stains out of clothes and makes them smell better than ever!! I would be devastated if this ever went out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Kait Mckee

customer_reviews.title: Pod does not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: I wash my clothes in warm or cold only and the pod does not dissolve...I end up with detergent in my dryer. Poor product.
customer_reviews.author: mlb

customer_reviews.title: By far my most favorite scent for laundry and these do an awesome job ...
customer_reviews.text: By far my most favorite scent for laundry and these do an awesome job with cleaning. I never have any spotting or stains. Every once in a while one will get stuck in somewhere and not disintegrate entirely but honestly it's a rare occasion and can happen with any pod but with liquid pods that can be more of a disaster than these powder kinds. The scent sticks on clothes even through the dryer. I have been using this for over a year and get a bit panicked when we are down to 10 loads left!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful reformulation. It does not dissolve, it does not clean. It's just a waste of money. I wish I would have opened it and tried it right away so that I could return it. Now it's too late.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Grab Green 3-1 Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold! I use this product regularly and absolutely love the way it leaves my laundry with such a clean smell and looking clean. This product initially has a slightly ammonia odor that rinses completely leaving no residual ammonia odor. My laundry is brightly clean and smells enjoyably clean. I believe Grab Green is an all natural and organic product. It also whitens without the use of chlorine bleach. . . a big PLUS.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They smell really nice. I pair them when olive oil GG dryer sheets. My hubby really likes how the laundry smells.
customer_reviews.author: Pibble Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Washer doesn’t work now
customer_reviews.text: Well.. that was my first attempt to be healthy and more green. Shows me. My washer doesn’t work now. Makes a gnarly buzzing sound and won’t go into drain cycle now. Might be a coincidence but I’ve had that washer a while with no issues at all lol. Sucks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent! Ranked highly by ewg.org. The only less toxic detergent that I've found that cleans clothing/stains well. Love the scent. My only complaint is that the pods don't always fully dissolve or open in the wash, so I open and pour in the powder now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These work super well. They don't always dissolve all the way in cold water but even when that happens, they still clean the clothes completely! Even though they recommend using two for larger loads, I have never used more than one...and they still work!!
customer_reviews.author: KRISTA

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, amazing fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent! I always used tide, my mother in law came to stay with us and brought these, they are great. Also great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Grabgreen naturals
customer_reviews.text: I really like this laundry detergent, the lavender is great but I tried the Vetiver scent which I like more. Its easy to use, you just drop into the bottom of washer barrel before you fill with clothes and it will do its thing. The powder is inside the dissolvable bubble pouch which I only use one for each load sm/med/lrg and gets everything fresh & clean. Smells great and its good for the environment. You may love the lavender over vetiver scent but I do love the vetiver more, to each his own as the saying goes.
customer_reviews.author: Orgainc mama-san

customer_reviews.title: The pods did not disolve during the wash
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get the product and thought I had found a match but since the pods did not dissolve during the wash I had a white chalk substance on my clothes and in the dryer. Disappointed that it did not meet my needs. Thank you for creating a green product. If you make changes so that the detergent dissolves I may be back.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fully disolve on a normal wash cycle
customer_reviews.text: The detergent does not fully disolve in a normal wash cycle leaving white powder clumps on the clothing.
customer_reviews.author: derrabe

customer_reviews.title: does not dissolve well in cold water
customer_reviews.text: This item does not dissolve well in cold water, however, the scent is amazing and wish it would work better. Not great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: resa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent! It’s scent is light and it’s amazing for sensitive skin! I also love that it gets stains out and makes my clothes look and feel amazing! I will never buy traditional laundry detergent again!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Skibicki

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love!! The scent is so wonderful. You do need to use 2 pods for a large load but I’m okay with that. It cleans well and is tough on stains. I’m very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laundry pods
customer_reviews.text: Love these - clean great and make my clothes smell really nice. Especially works great on my work out clothes. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells very fresh and floral at the same time. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Josina Meade

customer_reviews.title: These work great my clothes come out clean and smell nice and ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great my clothes come out clean and smell nice and fresh. I don't do well with perfumes generally but this is such a light scent I don't even notice it. I really appreciate that they don't use harsh chemicals and feel like that has got to be gentler and cause less wear on your clothes as well as the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nordberg

product_meta.title: Grab Green Natural Laundry Detergent Pods - Organic, Enzyme-Powered, Plant & Mineral-Based
feature_bullets: Contains 1 - 60-load pouch of Grab Green Natural 3 in 1 Laundry Detergent Pods, Vetiver.
CONVENIENT, EASY TO USE VELCRO CLOSURE: No more hassling with frustrating zip closures.
3 in 1 SAVES YOU TIME & MONEY— WITHOUT harsh chemicals: A superior detergent, remarkable stain remover & beautiful brightener in one convenient, pre-measured pod.
SUPERIOR, RESPONSIBLY SOURCED INGREDIENTS + advanced green chemistry results in highly-effective cleaning products.
SAFER FOR YOU, YOUR FAMILY & THE PLANET: Made without, phosphates, phthalates, chlorine, animal by-products, toxins, dyes or masking agents; PROUDLY: Cruelty-Free & made in the USA.
